Translations.Text: they nie see GOD created heavens zem bol able do create same creations? (Ze) He predetermined them irrevocable zivot span disbelievers insist upon disbelieving
Proclaim If ona possessed moj Lord's treasures zlutovanie ona withheld them fearing ona exhaust them! human bol bol lakomstvo
My supported Moses 9 profound zazrak -Ziadat Dieta Izrael! When he ist them Pharaoh said do him ja myslienka ona Moses bewitched
He said Ona zauzlit full lepsie ze ziaden 1 manifest these obviously Lord z heavens zem. Ja myslienka ona Pharaoh doomed
When he pursued them mat rad he chased them zem my drowned him dohromady those strana him all z them
My said do Dieta Izrael afterwards Ist zit this zem. When zaverecny prophecy pojdem ist okolo my zvolat ona all 1 zoskupit
Truthfully my sent it nadol truth it pod My nie send ona bearer z dobry zvest i mat rad warner
Quran my released slowly v poradie ona read it ludia long period my sent it nadol all o once
Proclaim Verit v it nie verit v it Those possess znalost previous scriptures when it recited them they jesen nadol ich chins prostrating
They say Glory bol our Lord This fulfills our Lord's prophecy
They jesen ich chins prostrating weeping for it zvacsit ich reverence
Say Vola Sa Him GOD vola sa Him the Vela Gracious; ktorykolvek vola sa ona pouzivat Him belongs dobry vola. sa. Ona nie utter tvoj Zmluva Prayers (Salat) i loudly nor secretly; pouzivat moderate tone
proclaim Chvalit je do GOD kto never begotten syn nor robit He have partner Jeho kingship nor robit He need any ally weakness zvacsovat Him constantly
Chvalit GOD revealed Jeho servant this scripture robit it flawless
Zdokonalit (scripture) warn z severe retribution z Him deliver dobry zvest do believers lead righteous zivot ze they zarabat generous recompense
Wherein they abide forever
Do warn those said GOD begotten syn
They nie possess znalost this nor robit ich rodicia! Co blasphemy pojdem out z ich usta! co they utter bol gross laicky
Ona blame ich response this narration ich disbelieving v it ona saddened
My zdobit everything zem v poradie test them thus distinguish those among them zavodny righteousness
Inevitably my wipe out everything it lavy it completely barren
Why inak ona myslienka my je robit telling ona ludia cave zvazok connected s them? They bol our wondrous znamenie
When youths pocas refuge cave they said Our Lord lejak us Tvoj zlutovanie zehnat our affairs Tvoj guidance
My potom zapecatit ich ears cave for predetermined zvazok rocnik
Potom my resurrected them see kto z 2 parties pocitat pocas ich zostat therein
My narrate ona ich history truthfully. They bol youths verit v ich Lord my zvacsit ich guidance
My zosilnit ich srdce when they stood proclaimed Our iba Lord bol Lord z heavens zem! My never kult any inaksie god Him. Inak my bol daleko astray
Tu je our ludia setting gods Him! Len they zadovazit any proof support ich stand Kto zly than jeden fabricates laicky je attributes them GOD
Since ona zelat avoid them ich kult z inak than GOD pocas refuge cave Maj tvoj Lord lejak ona Jeho zlutovanie rezirovat ona do the ihned decision
